sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SMELL, a word which in most languages has two meanings, signifying cither that sensation of mind of which we are conscious, in consequence of certain impressions made on the nostrils, and conveyed to the brain by the olfactory nerves; or that unknown virtue, or quality in bodies, which is the cause of our sensations of smell.
